TneTabItem Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
ApplyStyle

Represents method ApplyStyle.

DoMouseLeave

Represents method DoMouseLeave.

MouseClick(TMouseButton,TShiftState,Single,Single)

Represents method MouseClick(TMouseButton,TShiftState,Single,Single).

MouseMove(TShiftState,Single,Single)

Represents method MouseMove(TShiftState,Single,Single).

RefreshControl

Refreshes the control by calling ApplyStyle and DoMouseLeave event.
